Package edu.rpi.legup.model.rules

Class ContradictionRule

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.rules.Rule
edu.rpi.legup.model.rules.ContradictionRule

public abstract class ContradictionRule extends Rule
ContradictionRule is an abstract class representing a rule that identifies contradictions in a puzzle. It provides methods to check for contradictions both globally and at specific puzzle elements.
